alert.note: Alert for Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 04 at 9:30PM PST until February 05 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Strongest western peaks. * WHERE...Santa Monica Mountains. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Roadways that may be affected by gusty cross winds include Kanan, Malibu Canyon, Topanga, and Decker Canyon Roads.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
